thread.section_title: Citadines South Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful
thread.title_full: Wonderful - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer K
title: Wonderful
text: The Citadines South Kensington is an excellent place to stay. Their location to the underground, stores and restaurants made our vacation very enjoyable. We enjoyed the apartment style accommodations . They even provide a cell phone, which you can take on outings to use. One could also make international calls free of charge! Staff was very friendly and helpful.
